thread.title: BRIEF-Netas Telekom sets Netas Wesley Clover Teknoloji Fund with Canadian investor Wesley Clover
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Netas Telekom sets Netas Wesley Clover Teknoloji Fund with Canadian investor Wesley Clover | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Netas Telekom sets Netas Wesley Clover Teknoloji Fund with Canadian investor Wesley Clover
text:
Sept 30 Netas Telekomunikasyon AS :
* Establishes Netas Wesley Clover Teknoloji Fund in collaboration with Canadian investor Wesley Clover
* Established fund to invest in early-stage companies and support high value added technology projects under the management of TRPE Capital
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
